MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 11-JAN-2021 14:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the KA15 postcode area of Beith, affecting properties in Mains Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.44am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Viewpark Beith substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.32pm on the 11th of January 2021.
